LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CD_MoodDebuffDesc: Sets the debuff a pawn gets if they gain an implant or additional part at or beyond the industrial tech level.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CD_ChancePerImplantDesc: Sets how more likely SHODAN will assert control with each additional industrial added part or implant.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CD_BrainImplantForceDesc: Toggle if a brain implant will guarantee SHODAN's domination.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_MTBHackDesc: Set the average number of days before SHODAN hacks a power trading building.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_MTBSubversionDesc: Set the average number of days before SHODAN tries a subversion incident.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_PowerFlatDesc: Sets the flat power requirement debuff at 25% control.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_GenFactorDesc: Sets the power generation debuff factor at 75% control.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_ConsumpFactorDesc: Multiplies the power requirement of buildings at 50% control.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_HeatPushDesc: Determines how much heat gets pushed each time a building is damaged during the overclock gamecondition.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_OverloadBoomChanceDesc: Sets how likely each individual building is going to explode.
